text:
I’m looking for someone to create a responsive mega menu module in HubSpot to match my wordpress website, is this something you can help with? 

Some details:
There are 6 menu items, all have drop downs. The third menu option needs a three column mega menu. The remainder are regular drop downs.
<@UNZ3LRYQY> What kind of times line are you looking to accomplish this in?
by next thursday would be ideal
